entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reload erases captured local variables in async function #63294
    17.4
  • Intermediate Generator outputs #63291
    C# 12.0
  • Prevent analyzer/generator authors from using banned APIs #63290
    17.4
  • InvalidOperationException thrown by AbstractMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider #63287
  • DocumentEditor.AddAttribute() ignores generic parameters #63281
  • Generate new type dialog from struct interface list as generic type parameter only allows generating interfaces #63280
    Backlog
  • Incomplete automatic constructor generation for derived class #63273
    Backlog

Closed

  • Inconsistency in allowed and forbidden operations using tuple syntax when System.ValueTuple is not defined #63278
  • Unexpected escape analysis behavior for interpolated string with variable of local scope #63262
    17.4
  • Binder cycle leads to `NullReferenceException` #63140
    17.4
  • Missing IConstructorBodyOperation for types with PrimaryConstructor #58741
    17.4
  • stackalloc should be disallowed for structs with ref fields #63104
    17.4
  • Code CleanUp 'make field readonly, add 'readonly' when only written by for-loop #59720
    Backlog
  • Directory separator does not work for .editorconfig #62501
  • SimplifyTypeNamesDiagnosticAnalyzerBase should sub-type AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62639
    Backlog
  • Semantic Snippets - Completion list filtering #63211
    17.4 P2
  • Auto-default structs cause runtime exceptions in explicit constructors when a ref field is not initialized #63018
    17.4
  • Additional tab white space on XML comment leading trivia if Attribute is added prior #63227
    Backlog
  • Duplicate analyzer diagnostics from CompilationWithAnalyzers #63205
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32808.858 #63272
  • Report error if ScopedRefAttribute is used directly in source #62124
    17.4
  • [API Proposal]: ModuleInitializerAttribute for VB.NET #62625
  • .net 6 + ISymbol.GetAttributes returns Attributes without constructor arguments. #62672
  • CS8604 Compiler Warning despite previous null checking against the parameter #62975
  • GTD fails to navigate to System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335 types #63166
    Backlog
  • `CS0169` is reported only on build #63164
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix key for VisualFSharp.UnitTests IVT #63297
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always use filter text to select between keyword and type item for special types #63296
    Area-IDE
  • Fixes EnC slot mapping for certain kinds of synthesized variables lifted to state machine fields #63295
    Area-Compilers
  • Integrate Lambda Default Parameters into Synthesized Delegate Types and Lowering Pass #63293
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable adding attributes to generic types #63292
    Area-IDE
  • Restore nullable warnings for unset required members from base types #63286
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Merge release/dev17.4-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #63284
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63283
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63282
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #63279
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semantic Snippets - Fix how snippets appear in the completion list #63277
    Area-IDE
  • Use existing Program class declaration in "Convert to 'Program.Main'" refactoring when possible #63276
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix moving nested type to another file from an interface #63274
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Test PDB checksums emitted for source generated files #63038
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Rename internal 'LanguageServices' namespace to not collide with new 'LanguageServices' type. #63249
    Area-IDE, Next
  • EnC: Log deltas and messages to disk #63269
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #63285
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Convert to record #62999
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Check interpolated string arguments in Binder.GetValEscape() #63263
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63251
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63119
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Disallow using ScopedRef in source #63046
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Avoid resolving parameter.Type in ReportParameterErrors() #63142
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Move options subsystem over to using SolutionService snapshots. #63245
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Consider types with ref fields as managed #63209
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Fix capability granting for auto-properties #63271
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, Next
  • Fix value usage info for VB 'For .. To' #63275
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Derive type names analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62869
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Auto-default ref fields with a null ref-assignment #63065
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Mark shipped APIs #63244
    Area-Infrastructure, api-approved
  • Fix analyzer action state tracking for partial analysis #63206
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Document build correctness leg #63268
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63250
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Create CLaSP Framework surface area #63149
    Area-IDE
  • Keep the host solution pinned on the remote workspace side while performing an inline-rename session #63197
    Area-IDE
  • Completion for .editorconfig files #63019
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Handle `[UnscopedRef] scoped` in source and metadata #63134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add support for incremental analysis for method body editing scenario… #63130
    Area-Analyzers
  • Remove prefer system hash code from EditorConfig UI #62939
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Partition helix test runs using historical execution time data #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Dont throw on null return #63267
    Area-Compilers
  • Change the renamer benchmark to rename SyntaxNode #63246
    Area-IDE
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
